channel.title: RiotLocus RS2 -?
channel.description:
[center][b][size=14pt]RiotLocus RS2 - ?[/size][/b][/center]
RiotLocus RS2 isn't a old school server, nor is it a attempt to satisfy people surround me. It's for my own joy, and my own satisfaction. The combat will be rewritten, from nerly nothing. It's based of RiotScap which was released by lmc.
[b]Update Log[/b] [code] Written seperated classes for eating & potting(Potion.java, food.java)(Making life simple) packaged the whole server, just to make my life easier. Upgraded the version of the Mina Combat has been slightly rewritten [/code]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2nlaech.gif[/img]

item.title: RiotLocus RS2 -?

item.description:
@Atreyu_Smith wrote:

[center][size=14pt]RiotLocus RS2 - ?[/size][/center]

RiotLocus RS2 isn’t a old school server, nor is it a attempt to satisfy people surround me. It’s for my own joy, and my own satisfaction. The combat will be rewritten, from nerly nothing. It’s based of RiotScap which was released by lmc.

Update Log

Written seperated classes for eating & potting(Potion.java, food.java)(Making life simple)
packaged the whole server, just to make my life easier.
Upgraded the version of the Mina
Combat has been slightly rewritten
